mapper.select: SELECT cgi.id, cgi.car_order_id as carOrderId, cgi.distributor_store_id as distributorStoreId, cgi.vin, cgi.brand_id as brandId, cgi.family_id as familyId, cgi.vehicle_id as vehicleId, cgi.fund_property as fundProperty, cgi.engine_name as engineName, cgi.decorations_out_id as decorationsOutId, cgi.decorations_out_name as decorationsOutName, cgi.decorations_in_id as decorationsInId, cgi.decorations_in_name as decorationsInName, cgi.engine_num as engineNum, cgi.key_num as keyNum, cgi.certification_num as certificationNum, cgi.import_num as importNum, cgi.warranty_num as warrantyNum, cgi.inspection_num as inspectionNum, cgi.standard_price as standardPrice, cgi.purchase_price as purchasePrice, cgi.purchase_price_pio as purchasePricePio, cgi.freight_charge as freightCharge, cgi.entire_purchase_price as entirePurchasePrice, cgi.include_boutique_price as includeBoutiquePrice, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.purchase_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')purchaseDate, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.produce_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')produceDate, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.offline_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')offlineDate, cgi.interest_free_day as interestFreeDay, cgi.optional_package_status as optionalPackageStatus, cgi.guaranty_status as guarantyStatus, cgi.finance_company_id as financeCompanyId, cgi.forward_car_status as forwardCarStatus, cgi.in_storage_day as inStorageDay, cgi.storage_status as storageStatus, cb.name as brandName, cb.factory_name as factoryName, cf.name as familyName, cf.source_id as sourceId, cvc.year, cvc.name as vehicleName, fc.name as financeCompanyName FROM car_good_info cgi LEFT JOIN car_brand cb on cgi.brand_id = cb.id LEFT JOIN car_family cf on cgi.family_id = cf.id LEFT JOIN car_vehicle_conf cvc on cgi.vehicle_id = cvc.id LEFT JOIN finance_company fc on cgi.finance_company_id = fc.id where cgi.car_order_id = #{carOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by cgi.create_date desc

SELECT cgi.id, cgi.car_order_id as carOrderId, cgi.distributor_store_id as distributorStoreId, cgi.vin, cgi.brand_id as brandId, cgi.family_id as familyId, cgi.vehicle_id as vehicleId, cgi.fund_property as fundProperty, cgi.engine_name as engineName, cgi.decorations_out_id as decorationsOutId, cgi.decorations_out_name as decorationsOutName, cgi.decorations_in_id as decorationsInId, cgi.decorations_in_name as decorationsInName, cgi.engine_num as engineNum, cgi.key_num as keyNum, cgi.certification_num as certificationNum, cgi.import_num as importNum, cgi.warranty_num as warrantyNum, cgi.inspection_num as inspectionNum, cgi.standard_price as standardPrice, cgi.purchase_price as purchasePrice, cgi.purchase_price_pio as purchasePricePio, cgi.freight_charge as freightCharge, cgi.entire_purchase_price as entirePurchasePrice, cgi.include_boutique_price as includeBoutiquePrice, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.purchase_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')purchaseDate, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.produce_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')produceDate, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.offline_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')offlineDate, cgi.interest_free_day as interestFreeDay, cgi.optional_package_status as optionalPackageStatus, cgi.guaranty_status as guarantyStatus, cgi.finance_company_id as financeCompanyId, cgi.storage_status as storageStatus, cgi.dispose_status as disposeStatus, cgi.order_status as orderStatus, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.in_storage_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')inStorageDate, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.out_storage_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')outStorageDate, cgi.warehouse_id as warehouseId, cgi.storage_id as storageId, cgi.car_supply_status as carSupplyStatus, cgi.factory_report_status as factoryReportStatus, cgi.virtual_record_status as virtualRecordStatus, cgi.deceive_report_status as deceiveReportStatus, cgi.new_boutique_status as newBoutiqueStatus, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.sell_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')sellDate, cgi.forecast_profit as forecastProfit, cgi.count_profit as countProfit, cgi.hot_status as hotStatus, cgi.forward_car_status as forwardCarStatus, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.first_dms_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')firstDmsDate, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.real_dms_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')realDmsDate, cgi.operator_id as operatorId, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')createDate, DATE_FORMAT(cgi.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')updateDate, cgi.status, cgi.two_dimensional_code as twoDimensionalCode, cgi.purchase_day as purchaseDay, cgi.in_storage_day as inStorageDay, cgi.plan_allow_price as planAllowPrice, cgi.car_data as carData, cgi.remark, cgi.source, cgi.batch_rebate as batchRebate, cgi.retail_rebate as retailRebate, cb.name as brandName, cb.factory_name as factoryName, cf.name as familyName, cf.source_id as sourceId, cvc.year, cvc.name as vehicleName, fco.name as financeCompanyName, cw.name as warehouseName, cs.name as storageName, cw.picture as warehousePicture FROM car_good_info cgi LEFT JOIN car_brand cb on cgi.brand_id = cb.id LEFT JOIN car_family cf on cgi.family_id = cf.id LEFT JOIN car_vehicle_conf cvc on cgi.vehicle_id = cvc.id LEFT JOIN finance_company fco on cgi.finance_company_id = fco.id LEFT JOIN car_warehouse cw on cgi.warehouse_id = cw.id LEFT JOIN car_storage cs on cgi.storage_id = cs.id where cgi.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
update car_good_info
storage_status = #{storageStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
out_storage_date =DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
WHERE id IN ( SELECT car_good_id FROM car_out WHERE application_id = #{applicationId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.family_id cfid, c.vehicle_id, c.license_num, c.brand_id, c.vin, c.engine_num, c.decorations_out_id, c.decorations_out_name, c.decorations_in_id, c.decorations_in_name, cvc.`name` AS chexing_name, cf.`name` AS cfname, cb.`name` AS pingpai_name FROM car_test_info c LEFT JOIN car_vehicle_conf cvc ON c.vehicle_id=cvc.id LEFT JOIN car_family cf ON cf.id=cvc.family_id LEFT JOIN car_brand cb ON cb.id=cf.brand_id WHERE c.distributor_store_id=cf.distributor_store_id=cb.distributor_store_id=cvc.distributor_store_id
AND c.distributor_store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
,
from car_good_info where vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = 1 limit 1

SELECT c.id, c.distributor_store_id, c.family_id, c.vehicle_id, c.brand_id, c.vin, c.engine_num, c.storage_status, c.warehouse_id, c.storage_id, c.decorations_out_id, c.decorations_out_name, c.decorations_in_id, c.decorations_in_name, c.new_boutique_status, c.optional_package_status, c.in_storage_day, cvc.`name` AS chexing_name, cf.`name` AS chexi_name, cb.`name` AS pingpai_name, (SELECT cw.name from car_warehouse cw WHERE cw.id=c.warehouse_id) cangku_name, (SELECT name FROM car_storage cs WHERE cs.id=c.storage_id) kuwei FROM car_good_info c LEFT JOIN car_vehicle_conf cvc ON cvc.id=c.vehicle_id LEFT JOIN car_family cf ON cf.id=cvc.family_id LEFT JOIN car_brand cb ON cb.id=cf.brand_id WHERE c.distributor_store_id= cb.distributor_store_id= cf.distributor_store_id= cvc.distributor_store_id and c.vin=#{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT c.id, c.distributor_store_id, c.family_id, c.vehicle_id, c.brand_id, c.vin, c.engine_num, c.storage_status, c.warehouse_id, c.storage_id, c.decorations_out_id, c.decorations_out_name, c.decorations_in_id, c.decorations_in_name, c.new_boutique_status, c.optional_package_status, c.in_storage_day, cvc.`name` AS chexing_name, cf.`name` AS chexi_name, cb.`name` AS pingpai_name FROM car_good_info c LEFT JOIN car_vehicle_conf cvc ON cvc.id=c.vehicle_id LEFT JOIN car_family cf ON cf.id=cvc.family_id LEFT JOIN car_brand cb ON cb.id=cf.brand_id WHERE c.distributor_store_id= cb.distributor_store_id= cf.distributor_store_id= cvc.distributor_store_id AND c.storage_status=1 AND c.dispose_status=1
AND c.distributor_store_id=#{storeId}
mapper.update:
update car_good_info
car_order_id = #{carOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
distributor_store_id = #{distributorStoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
family_id = #{familyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fund_property = #{fundProperty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
engine_name = #{engineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decorations_out_id = #{decorationsOutId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
decorations_out_name = #{decorationsOutName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
decorations_in_id = #{decorationsInId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
decorations_in_name = #{decorationsInName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
engine_num = #{engineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
key_num = #{keyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certification_num = #{certificationNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
import_num = #{importNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warranty_num = #{warrantyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inspection_num = #{inspectionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
standard_price = #{standardPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
purchase_price_pio = #{purchasePricePio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
freight_charge = #{freightCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
include_boutique_price = #{includeBoutiquePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
purchase_date = #{purchaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
produce_date = #{produceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
offline_date = #{offlineDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
interest_free_day = #{interestFreeDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
optional_package_status = #{optionalPackageStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
guaranty_status = #{guarantyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
finance_company_id = #{financeCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
finance_company_name = #{financeCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_storage_date = #{inStorageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
out_storage_date = #{outStorageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
storage_id = #{storageId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_supply_status = #{carSupplyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
factory_report_status = #{factoryReportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
virtual_record_status = #{virtualRecordStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deceive_report_status = #{deceiveReportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
new_boutique_status = #{newBoutiqueStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sell_date = #{sellDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
forecast_profit = #{forecastProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
count_profit = #{countProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
hot_status = #{hotStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
forward_car_status = #{forwardCarStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_dms_date = #{firstDmsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
real_dms_date = #{realDmsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
two_dimensional_code = #{twoDimensionalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_allow_price = #{planAllowPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
entire_purchase_price = #{entirePurchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
nation_guide_price = #{nationGuidePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
produce_day = #{produceDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
arrive_day = #{arriveDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
purchase_day = #{purchaseDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
interest_accrual_day = #{interestAccrualDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
in_storage_day = #{inStorageDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
interest_price = #{interestPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
residue_repayment_day = #{residueRepaymentDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
full_pay_date = #{fullPayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
storage_status = #{storageStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dispose_status = #{disposeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
family_name = #{familyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vehicle_name = #{vehicleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_check_id = #{carCheckId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_check_status = #{carCheckStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
instore_remark = #{instoreRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update car_good_info set year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, standard_price = #{guidePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, vehicle_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vehicle_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT cgi.id,cgi.decorations_out_name as decorationsOutName, cgi.decorations_in_name as decorationsInName, cgi.optional_package_status as optionalPackageStatus, cgi.standard_price as standardPrice,cgi.vehicle_id vehicleId, cgi.include_boutique_price as includeBoutiquePrice, cb.name as brandName,cf.id as familyId,cf.name as familyName, cvc.name as vehicleName,CONCAT(cb.name,cf.name,cvc.name) as salesdesc FROM car_good_info cgi LEFT JOIN car_brand cb on cgi.brand_id = cb.id LEFT JOIN car_family cf on cgi.family_id = cf.id LEFT JOIN car_vehicle_conf cvc on cgi.vehicle_id = cvc.id WHERE cgi.id = #{carId}
mapper.update:
update car_good_info
storage_status = #{storageStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
out_storage_date =DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
WHERE id IN ( SELECT car_good_id FROM car_allot WHERE application_id = #{applicationId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
update car_good_info set plan_allow_price = (standard_price - #{price}) where id = #{carId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.distributor_store_id, c.family_id, c.vehicle_id, c.brand_id, c.vin, c.engine_num, c.storage_status, c.warehouse_id, c.storage_id, c.decorations_out_id, c.decorations_out_name, c.decorations_in_id, c.decorations_in_name, c.new_boutique_status, c.optional_package_status, c.in_storage_day, cvc.`name` AS chexing_name, cf.`name` AS chexi_name, cb.`name` AS pingpai_name FROM car_good_info c LEFT JOIN car_vehicle_conf cvc ON cvc.id=c.vehicle_id LEFT JOIN car_family cf ON cf.id=cvc.family_id LEFT JOIN car_brand cb ON cb.id=cf.brand_id WHERE c.id=#{carId}
SELECT cgi.* FROM car_good_info cgi LEFT JOIN `order` o ON o.car_id = cgi.id AND o.`status` != 9 WHERE o.`status` IS NULL AND cgi.vehicle_id = #{vehicleId} ORDER BY cgi.in_storage_day DESC
SELECT td.test_car_id, td.status FROM test_drive td WHERE DATE_FORMAT(td.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND td.test_car_id=#{testCarId} ORDER BY td.create_time DESC LIMIT 1
